import React from "react"; const WeatherCard = ({ tempInfo }) => { const { temp, humidity, pressure, weathermood, name, speed, country, sunset, } = tempInfo; //convert seconds to time for the sunset let sec = sunset; let date = new Date(sec * 1000); let timeStr = `${date.getH}` return ( <> {/* our temp box */}
\
{" "}
{temp}°
sunny
{name},{country}
{new Date().toLocaleString()}
{/* our 4 column section */}

{sunset}
Sunset

{humidity}
humidity

{pressure}
Pressure

1{speed}
Speed

); }; export default WeatherCard;
